alert.note: Alert for Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 1:42PM MST until February 16 at 2:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to three inches. * WHERE...The Rocky Mountain Front. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 2 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Another fast moving weather system will produce new snowfall overnight, moving north to south through Wednesday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Northern Rocky Mountain Front; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
